title: Dr. Bridge Personnel File
content:
[[div style="float:right; margin:0 2em 1em 2em; width:300px; border:0;"]]
|||| [[image Bridge.jpg width="300px"]] ||
||||~ ^^Dr. Bridge, upon successful containment of [[[SCP-097]]].^^ ||

[[/div]]

**Name:** Dr. Django Bridge
**Security Clearance:** **5**
**Duties:** Archivist 

**History:** [ERATTA DEXPUNGED]

__**SCPs Dr. Bridge is responsible for:**__

[[[SCP-517]]] - Grammie Knows
[[[SCP-746]]] - Pseudo-Avian
[[[SCP-808]]] - The Mechanical Choir
[[[SCP-646]]] - Birth Worm
[[[SCP-478]]] - Tooth Fairies

[[[SCP-806]]] - Resurrection Projection
[[[SCP-569]]] - Heads
[[[SCP-789]]] - Internet-Savvy Predator
--SCP-1234 - From Point Pleasant-- - Lost through temporal flux.
[[[SCP-886]]] - Nanny
[[[SCP-097]]] - Old County Fair
[[[SCP-1379]]] - Stab Your Inner Child
[[[SCP-1479]]] - Inside-Outside
[[[SCP-1579]]] - Different Skin
[[[SCP-1679]]] - Post-Mortem Peoples' Choice

[[[SCP-1429]]]  - Organoid Organisms

[[[SCP-2840]]] - Apex Nightmare

[[[critters|Critters]]]

[[[Mr-Fish | Mr Fish]]]
[[[https://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/disciplinary-report-51b-46 | Dr Burns Disciplinary Report]]] (Shoop'd)

__**From //[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/competitive-eschatology-hub | Competitive Eschatology]]]//**__
* **[[[The Red Horse|The Red Horse (The Ironic Metaphor)]]]** (by //Dexanote//): **//"Today is a// very special //episode."//**
* //[[[internal-memo-regarding-a-theft | Interlude: A Memo Regarding a Theft]]]// (by //Dexanote//): **//Inventory check for Site 62 reveals the absence of SCP-573.//**
* **[[[The Bloody Autumn]]]** (by //Dexanote//): **//A child with pale skin, oily black eyes, and bloodied teeth.//**


__**Other:**__
[[[stolen-gilded-stolen-saved]]]



//Additionally, Dr Bridge has been entrusted with those items previously overseen by other Foundation employees, granted to him through extenuating circumstances.//
